source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_SEQ_00<tab>Blayves of Lost Hope is worried for a friend fallen ill.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_SEQ_00<tab>ロストホープ流民街のブレイヴスは友人の病気を心配しているようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_SEQ_01<tab>Blayves requires gigantoad secretions to treat an ailing friend. Travel to the Unholy Heir and obtain two vials of the foul stuff from the toxic toads that lurk there.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_SEQ_01<tab>病気の友人のためにトキシックトードの毒液が必要なようだ。「アンホーリーエアー」に棲む「トキシックトード」を倒し「トードの毒液」を2個入手しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the two vials of gigantoad secretions. Deliver them to Blayves at Lost Hope.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_SEQ_02<tab>トードの毒液を手に入れた。「ロストホープ流民街」の「ブレイヴス」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_SEQ_03<tab>Blayves is confident that the gigantoad secretions you provided will help stay his friend's sickness. Though Lost Hope is indeed in a sad state of affairs, Blayves appears resigned to his lot in life.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_SEQ_03<tab>トードの毒液をブレイヴスに渡した。これにより、流民街の人々は病死を免れるだろう。このように劣悪な環境の集落もウルダハにはある。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_TODO_00<tab>Obtain gigantoad secretions from toxic toads.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_TODO_00<tab>トキシックトードからトードの毒液を入手

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the gigantoad secretions to Blayves at Lost Hope.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_TODO_01<tab>ブレイヴスにトードの毒液を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_000<tab>You look as if you've put a few beasts down in your days. Would you mind putting down a few more?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_000なあ……あんた……冒険者か？
結構強いんだろ？　だったらひとつ頼みをきいてくれよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_001<tab>A friend of mine has been taken ill, and I simply must have gigantoad secretions from the liver of a toxic toad to treat him. Two vials would suffice. You can find the nasty creatures in the Unholy Heir.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_001「トキシックトード」から「トードの毒液」がとれるんだが、
こいつを2匹ぶん取ってきてほしい。
奴らは「アンホーリーエアー」って沼沢地にいる。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_002<tab>Do me this favor, I beg you. My friend will die without treatment. Please!
target: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_002<tab>頼むよ……このままじゃ、俺の友が死んじまうんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_010<tab>I must have two vials of gigantoad secretions from the liver of a toxic toad. Please, my friend does not have much time left!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_010「トキシックトード」から「トードの毒液」を2匹ぶんだ。
頼む！　友の命がかかってるんだ……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_011<tab>Oh, bless you! You are not a moment too soon. After some light preparation, I'll be able to give this to my friend.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_011ああ、持ってきてくれたか！
この毒液を乾燥させてから粉末に砕くとよ、
強心作用のある生薬になるんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_012<tab>He has always had a weak heart. Were he rich, he could take the meals and reagents he needs, and we would have no need for such foulness as the bile of toads.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_012俺の友は、もとから心の臓が弱くてな。
まともな食事と錬金薬を買うだけの金さえあれば、
こんな危ない生薬も必要ないんだが……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_013<tab><sigh> Hope is not all that is lost to us here─gil and good health are scarce, as well. A necessary evil in a nation such as Ul'dah, I suppose. The few at the top feast and flourish, while the many at the bottom starve and suffer.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL098_00530_BLAYVES_013苦しんでるのは、俺の友だけじゃねぇ。
この流民街の住民すべてが、金と希望を無くしちまった。
だがこれもウルダハの現実のひとつ、光と影ってやつさ。
